attributes.title: Worst. App. EVER!
attributes.review: Downloading this app was probably one of my biggest regrets ever. When I opened it, it wanted me to give my phone number and email to support Trump! 🤢 I immediately deleted... 0 stars all around

attributes.title: Stay Safe King Trump
attributes.review: I love my president Trump so when this app asked for my social security I gladly gave it. But now I keep getting notices from my bank account saying all the money is withdrawn. Anything for the Trump campaign tho! hoo ra

attributes.title: Probably the worst app to exist
attributes.review: Everything about this makes me sick to my stomach, I don’t even think I need to explain my self, but if u support trump and this app, ur sick. And that’s all I have to say😌

attributes.title: Badly set up
attributes.review: Had a hard interface screen and it had only a few functions a really badly set up app

attributes.title: ✨bad app✨
attributes.review: i got very traumatized by the pictures are very 🍊 presidents pp and would not recommend this app it is very bad and made my phone start glitching and when i put my phone number in it keep asking me to do horrible things like support are president 🥳🤯and i came to the conclusion that are president is very 🍊 and needs to step down and not take down my beloved app called tik tok

attributes.title: Most disgusting app ever😤👎🏽
attributes.review: I’m really furious that this took 69 hours to download!!!!!! And to make it worse it asks you to pay for his premium every 2 minutes no thank you😡

attributes.title: unnecessary spam
attributes.review: the sheer amount of spam i got sent to my email only after a week of having this app about Trump’s campaign was ridiculous.

attributes.title: Incorrect information
attributes.review: While being on the app I noticed a multitude of false information being broadcasted on this platform.

attributes.title: DISTURBING
attributes.review: This app is horrible I saw trumps bare badonkadonk and I’m not about it I’m deeply disturbed I will not be voting for trump in the upcoming election because I can not believe he did this it was horrible my 10 yr old daughter was right next to me aswell

attributes.title: It hurt my hamsters feelings
attributes.review: I downloaded this app cuz a bird said to show my hamster so I did and it said I’m not an orange Oompa Loompa cuz they suckkkz like microwaves and since my hamster is orange she got hurt cuz he said they suckkkz theN he said he hates nuggets and my hamsters name is nugget so she started crying.....FRICK YOU  DONALD DUMP TRUMP
